name: Phoneduty
description: A Twilio/PagerDuty integration to route incoming calls to the on-call engineer

PAGERDUTY_SCHEDULE_ID.description: The PagerDuty Schdule ID to query

PAGERDUTY_SERVICE_API_TOKEN.description: The service API key that an incident will be created on if a voicemail is left

PAGERDUTY_DOMAIN.description: The name of your PagerDuty account, as it appears in the URL

PHONEDUTY_ANNOUNCE_GREETING.description: Optional: Any additional greeting to add before the 'The current on-call engineer is' announcement.

PHONEDUTY_ANNOUNCE_TIME.description: Optional: Should we announce the time to the caller before connecting to an Engineer? Defaults to False if not set.

PHONEDUTY_CHECK_FOR_HUMAN.description: Optional: Should we ask the caller to press a button before connecting to an Engineer? Defaults to False if not set.

PHONEDUTY_OUT_CALLERID.description: Optional: Should we manually set the outbound callerid? Useful for ensuring engineers answer the phone. defaults blank if not set.

TWILIO_LANGUAGE.description: What language should Twilio use? Default is en-GB.

TWILIO_RECORD.description: Optional: Should we record the conversation? Defaults to False if not set.
